input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. How can I help you? How do you cancel a subscription? I'm sorry to hear that you might want to cancel your subscription. Did something happen that made you want to do this? No, not at all.  I was just thinking of ordering some things and I don't want to if the cancelation process is too hard. Alright let me see what I can find for you. So, you will be able to cancel the subscription at any time and not be charged. The current monnth, however you are responsible for the full period but will also recieve the full benefits of the subscription for that period. Ok, and how do I cancel?  Is there a link or something? That should be available on your account page, let me provide you with a link for it. Alright, did you have any other concerns I could address for you? No that is everything.  Thanks for the info. No problem. Thank you for shopping with us, Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Thank you for shopping with AcmeBrands! How may I assist you? Hi, I was wondering what the return policy is as I am torn between two sizes. Our return policy depends on what membership level you are. Gold members can return unlimited items; silver members can make returns for anything purchased within the last 6 months; bronze members can make returns for anything purchased in the last 9 oh great! I am silver and six months is more than enough time to decide! Oops, looks like it cut off. Bronze members can return anything purchased within the last 90 days, and all other members have 30 days to return an item. Oh, fantastic! Is there anything else you need? no you have been wonderful! Thank you and have a great day!

target: pull up the costumer account [norman bouchard]; notify team [michael kors boots size 9]; make purchase [michael kors boots, size 9]
input: Dialogue: Thanks for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? I'm looking at a pair of boots on your website and the size I want says unavailable. Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.  Let me see what I can do I may be able to help with this, may I ask your full name and account ID before we begin? Norman Bouchard I might not be able to find the item for you, but I should still be able to let our purchasing department know what it is that you were looking for I don't have my account ID Ah, that shouldn't be a problem, I can see your account now, Mr. Bouchard I'm looking for the Michael Kors boots in a size 9 Okay, I have notified our purchasing department about the missing items, and hopefully they can do a better job next time. Ok thank you.  Will they notify me if they are in stock? I'm sorry we couldn't have that item available for you.  They should notify you when it is in stock, or, if you'd prefer I can put in a back-order for you? Yes, please put it on backorder If I place the order for you now, it would ship automatically as soon as we get it in, if that's okay That is fine. Excellent, if you would like to use the same credit card that we already have on file, I can do that for you right now Yes please Okay, your order is placed, and it should be on its way to you as soon as possible.  Is there anything else I can help you with today? That's everything.  Thanks for your help. You're very welcome.  Have a great day

target: pull up the costumer account [norman bouchard]; validate purchase [normanbouchard902, normanbouchard902@email.com, 9055618082]; check membership level [guest]
input: Dialogue: Hi, how can I help you I am very upset with this company. Sorry this has happened How can I help Well, I see a charge on my billing statement that was supposed to have been reversed. I sent the darn jeans back already!!! What is the charge for? $54.00 So you returned Jeans and didn't get the credit you were supposed to get? Exactly.  Finally someone is actually helping me! Sorry this happened. I should be able to help Can I have your full name or Account ID please? Did you lay off agents because of the virus? We have had to move many agents to work at home status, so there are some problems People have to get used to the software at home I am sorry to hear that. Norman Bouchard Yes, it's a good company though so they are trying not to fire anyone Ok, I need to look up your order. Can I have your username, email and Order ID? Well, if you can help me, then I will send an email to your supervisor telling them how great you were. I hope I can help you then! normanbouchard902 normanbouchard902@email.com 9055618082 Okay, do you know how many days it's been since you received the refund? I never received a refund.  That's why I'm calling. sorry, since you were supposed to receive the credit It's been 3 days. okay, that's good news. what membership level are you? I'm just a guest.  Membership levels are too over-priced IMHO. I understand, they are pretty expensive Okay, it is expected to take up to 7 days for the credit to go into your account. I can't issue you the credit now, because you would likely end up with two credits when the other one goes through The credit should show up within the next four days! Okay.  So then I need to wait. Yes, unfortunately that's all you can do at this time. Sorry for the delay What is your Agent ID #? 777211 Okay, 777211.  I am going to send your supervisor a note telling them how helpful you were today. Thank you very much! You can ask for me if it doesn't go through for some reason and I will issue the credit on the eighth day! That's even better.  I appreciate you! Thank you, Can I do anything else for you today? No, that will be all.  Have a great day. You too, Stay safe and healthy! Good bye

target: pull up the costumer account [david williams]; record reason [yesterday]; verify costumer identity [david williams, qs1bixhffl, 6775971413]; offer promo code [none]
input: Dialogue: Welcome to AcmeBrands, how may I help you? Hi, my name is David Williams, and I have a question about my recent order. OK, David. I'll pull up your account and have a look. Thanks What specifically do you want to know about your order? Well, as a regular customer of AcmeBrands, I feel that the shipping cost is excessive. OK, let me see what I can do about that. Are you asking about a mystery fee? No, no mystery fee, just the amount charged for shipping. It seems excessive when compared to my previous orders. OK, let me see what I can do. Thanks very much Can I get your order number and account ID? Sure. Account id is QS1BIXHFFL and the order number is 6775971413 OK, let me pull the order up. Your technology is in need of an upgrade. Once you accessed my account you should be able to see the orders. Unfortunatley, it appears this is something out of my control. Our pricing algorithms often dynamically change prices. Really, do your algorithms not recognize that I am a gold member? Unfortunately Gold membership does not help here. I can offer you a discount code, if you'd like. How much is the discount? It is 25% off any item. That is fair enough. I like your merchandise but not your technology. Time for a new CIO! I'm sorry for your trouble. Is there anything else I can help you with? Please confirm that the discount code appears on my account. I take it that my next purchase will be 25% off? Yes, the code appears on your account. That is fine - I appreciate your professionalism. Thanks very much and enjoy your day. Thank you, and have a nice day.

OK, let me see what I can do about that. Are you asking about a mystery fee? No, no mystery fee, just the amount charged for shipping. It seems excessive when compared to my previous orders. OK, let me see what I can do. Thanks very much Can I get your order number and account ID? Sure. Account id is QS1BIXHFFL and the order number is 6775971413 OK, let me pull the order up. Your technology is in need of an upgrade. Once you accessed my account you should be able to see the orders. Unfortunatley, it appears this is something out of my control. Our pricing algorithms often dynamically change prices. Really, do your algorithms not recognize that I am a gold member? Unfortunately Gold membership does not help here. I can offer you a discount code, if you'd like. How much is the discount? It is 25% off any item. That is fair enough. I like your merchandise but not your technology. Time for a new CIO! I'm sorry for your trouble. Is there anything else I can help you with? Please confirm that the discount code appears on my account. I take it that my next purchase will be 25% off? Yes, the code appears on your account. That is fine - I appreciate your professionalism. Thanks very much and enjoy your day. Thank you, and have a nice day. input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? Hi I have question on a product it's the tommy hilfiger shirt I wanted to know how easy (or hard) it is to get stains off of the shirt? Okay, I can check on that for you. ok Could I get your name please? Joseph Banter Well, Mr. Banter blood stains are especially tough, does it happen to be a blood stain? no, food like pasta sauce or pizza sauce Can you remind me, this was a shirt not a jacket right? yes the tommy hilfiger shirt If the stain is fresh you can simply rinse in cold water and then wash immediately after. what if it's like a day or two old? For dry stains soak the shirt in cold water foe about an hour. Then scrub the spot with dish washing soap, a toothbrush works well for this. Then wash in cold water. Can ok that's not too bad Is there anything else I can help out with? i'm good now thanks Have a good day.

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you? Hi! I just want to know the price of overnight shipping.  I have a concert tomorrow that I need to get a something for Sure, let me find that out for you. Overnight shipping depends on the weight of the item. If you're in the continental US, it will be $39.99 for items that are 5 lbs or less, $54.99 for items of 5-10 pounds, and $69.99 for anything more than 10 pounds. If you're in Hawaii or Alaska, the price is $10.00 higher per category. Great! Those prices aren't to bad.  Thank you so much You're welcome. Have a nice day.

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? I got a question about a recent purchase I just made I literally just bout this shirt recently but I found out that one of your competitors is selling it for almost half the price! Do you have a price match on these things? Or can I cancel my order? I can help you with that, first could you send me your account ID? yeah its QW8SATGGUA Ok, I'm going to enter your issue into the system real quick. ok Alright, I just need to validate your purchase, could you send me your full name and order ID? yeah my name is Alessandro Phoenix the ID is 3278902139 Ok, I have everything verified in the system. ok Unfortunately, we can't offer a price match since our pricing algorithms change dynamically to try to match the competitor's prices, so we don't have any control over our prices. ok can I cancel the transaction then? I'll just buy it from your competitor The best we could do is send you a discount for a future purchase with a discount code, would that work for you? how much is the discount? The discount would be for 30%, would that work? If not, I can cancel your order for you. actually I can work with 30%. How long until it expires? It will be valid for the next 90 days from today. ok i'll do that then Great, here is the discount code that you can enter on the checkout page for your next purchase: GSJII. Is there anything else I can help with? no that's it. thanks for trying Glad I could help, have a great day!

target: pull up the costumer account [alessandro phoenix]; notify team [purchasing department]
input: Dialogue: How may I help you tonight? Hey. why are some many items always out of stock? I want to buy a jacket - no jacket I want to buy some jeans - no jeans Nothing is available! Hi, sorry to hear that! Let me see what I can do to help you Can I get your name or account ID to get started? What do you need that for?! To pull up your account My name is Alessandro Phoenix Hi Alessandro, I see that you have been a valued member for a number of years now That's right!  I don't have a fancy subscription, but I have been a customer for a long time this past year things have just been missing what's going on? Right now there is some logistics issues happening in our Asia Pacific region But I understand this can be frustraing I will pass your message along to our purchasing department I see, well thanks for that Any idea on when this will get resolved? As a customer service rep, they only tell us so much From what I gather, it will be at least another week of delays.  We have been hearing many people with the same issue. Yea, ok, at least its not just on my end I thought you guys might have gone out of business I heard JC Penney is filing for bankruptcy Yes, I believe that may be true. We are still in business, just a small hiccup in the supply chain Things should be back to normal soon enough. Alright, well that's good to hear Are there any other questions you have today? No, that's it ok, well have a wonderful day Mr. Phoenix and please visit again in a week ok, thanks, i will

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting AcmeBrands! How can I help you? Hi.  I'm looking to buy a new jacket.  It's getting cold here! We have a lot of jackets available. Are you having a problem with placing your order? No I just have a question about the Guess Jacket that is $94. I can help you with that, but first could you provide me with your name? Crystal Minh What type of information do you need about our jackets, Crystal? I was wondering if this jacket came in a medium size and if there is a medium in stock in the store. Sure. Give me one moment to find the information for you. Our jackets are available in a variety of sizes, including medium. However, if our online shop doesn't have that size listed, we are currently out of stock. We restock at the start of every month. Ok, so if it is listed on the website then it should be available? Yes, that is correct. Ok, thanks.  It's not showing a medium, so I will check back at the start of the month. Great! Is there anything else that I can help you with today? That's all.  Thanks. You're welcome and have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? Hi, I found this awesome shirt and need it now! How much is overnight shipping Let's see what we can find out.  One moment. Here is what I found out. Overnight shipping is a weight-based rate that does not depend on distance if you are located in the continental United States. Oh ok so i guess it shouldnt be too much just for one shirt For US based customers, it is $39.99 for 5 pounds or less. Oh wow i was wrong... 1 shirt I would assume is less than 5 pounds. Well i guess if i am already spending 84 dollars on a shirt whats 40 more for shipping! Honestly you would only miss out a day or two with our regular shipping. Hmm good call Of course it is entirely up to you. Well thanks for the info Of course.  Is there anything else I can help you with today? No thank you! Thank you for your patronage and you have a wonderful rest of your day! You too!

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? Um hi, sorry to bother you with this...I keep trying to click on the search button to search up some items and it's not loading at all? I keep getting that spinning wheel indicating it's trying to do something but it hasn't changed. Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.  I might be able to offer up some ideas, and hopefully one of them will work Alright, let's try it! Two minds are better than one from what I hear and is it the search function that's giving you the most trouble today, or is it the whole site that's giving you spinning wheels? Yeah it looks like it, rest of the site works fine just the search button is not wanting to play along Okay, I have a few tricks that have helped customers in the past, and even myself when I was surfing at home once My apologies if some of these sound simplistic, but often they really do work Oh totally understand, lay them on me May I first ask that you simply log out of the site, and then log back in We will still stay connected Alrighty logging out now Anddddddd still not working Okay, that was at least worth a try. It was indeed Something else that often helps, are you able to clear out your browser cookies.  Sometimes the site can get a bit clogged Let's see if that'll help. I tried it earlier but maybe second time is the charm Hmmmmm..... Oh I think we're getting something Eyyy it's working again Ah, I'm glad to hear that Thanks so much for the help. You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can help with while we're here? I think we're all good thanks though Excellent.  Have a great day You too!

Account ID: A6JCHBKPQS OK, and I will also need your full name and order ID please. Albert Sanders Order ID: 2474299373 Thank you Albert.  Unfortunately our pricing is dynamic and changes frequently.  We have pricing algorithms that will change the prices of items based on hundreds of variables and we are not always able to guarantee a price will be the same from day Can I get a price adjustment to fix it? I cannot price match, however I can offer you a discount code for use with a future purchase if that will help. Promo code 33PVL can be used to take 25% off a single item for your next purchase. input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? Hi! Hello! Sorry, a little embarrassed I accidentally must have ordered the wrong size to a jacket I purchased, is there anything you can do to help? Let me see, I'll try to pull up what I can to help you! It was so horrible, I didn't know a jacket would double as a tube top if small enough Have you received the order already or is it still in shipping? It's arrived here yes, trying it on was a mistake I dont' think the kids will ever look at me the same Ahh okay, so you'd like to return it! Can I get your full name please? Oh yes sorry, I thought I mentioned that earlier Joseph Banter would be the name! And your username, email, and order ID? Certainly! Username is jb000270 Email is jb000270@email.com and Order ID is 3849635242 Okay, and what's your membership level? It's a very nice Gold! Well good news, as you're a Gold member you get unlimited returns Oh really?!?! That's amazing! Yup! Now you'll have to print out a shipping label so I'll need a lot of information to get that ready for you I think I can do that for you! Lay it on me I need your full address including street number, street name, city, state, and zip code 8595 Kennedy St  Monterey, WA 95915 And how would you like to process your return? Uhh process how? The options are By Mail, In Store, or Drop off at one of our Centers. As in how you plan on getting it back to us. Hmmm in store sounds fun Okay! Awesome! You've been so nice, thank you so much And with that everythings been done on my end You'll get an email with the information on what you'll need to do You truly are amazing, I hope you're having a great week so far Is there anything else I can do for you? Alrighty I'll look out for it, and I think that's all thank you Well then have a nice day!

input: Dialogue: Hi, thanks for contacting Acme customer support. How can I help you today? Hello, I am trying to get on the website but it is running really slow. That stinks. I can look into that for you. May I start by getting your full name? Crystal Minh Okay Ms. Minh. I'm going to try a few different things to try and diagnose the issue, is that okay? input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? I'm having a lot of trouble on the website. It is loading really slowly. I am very sorry to hear that, let's see what we can do to fix this. Thanks. I can't even see pictures because they are still loading If you don't mind, let's try a couple things and see if we can get this fixed for you. that sounds good Have you tried looking at other websites to see if they are slow as well? I'll check google is loading fine No problem so it isn't your internet connection.  Let's try the most common solution which has to do with cookies, try logging completely out then logging back in. okay Usually it is a corrupted cookie and after a complete relog it corrects itself. It's still taking forever. Should I close the browser after I log out? Yes the last step would be closing all tabs besides this one on your browser and trying again. hold on Also if you have too many programs in the background it slows things down too. gotcha so I think it's working nnow Still do the logout then log in. yes everything loaded Ah fantastic, I was just trying to save the current tabs you were on before we had to close them. Apologies for the trouble. That's okay I'm just glad to be able to use the site Thank you My pleasure, is there anything else I can help you with today? Not right now. Thanks again Thank you for your patronage and have a wonderful rest of your day!

input: Dialogue: Thank you for shopping with AcmeBrands! How may I assist you? I understand knowing about the different levels of membership and what they entail I like to know all the different membership levels please Norman Bouchard Sure! One moment while I pull up the information for you. There are three different levels: Bronze, Silver, and Gold.  Everyone else is a guest. Memberships are earned while subscriptions are bought. All members can go to the holiday extravaganza, which has an open bar and free flights from anywhere in the United States. I take them out and spending a lot of money but I want to get the best deal so that’s why I need to know about the different levels of membership and within tail This will take a bit, but I will get you all of the details. I'll break out the details for each level in a separate message. Bronze members also save on shipping fees and promo codes. To earn Bronze membership, you need to make at least $500 in purchases in a year. Sorry my dog jumped on me who pile typing No problem! Silver members get everything Bronze members do, as well as having the ability for agents to make purchases for them and they can cancel orders whenever they want. Silver membership requires $1000 in purchases over a year. Gold members get everything bronze and silver members do, as well as unlimited refunds and they will always be given what they ask for without question in transactions. Gold membership requires $2000 in purchases over a year plus answering a short qu Does that answer all of your questions? Yes thanks Oops, looks like it cut off. You have to answer a short questionnaire for Gold. Ok Is there anything else I can help you with? Have a great night You too No ty

input: Dialogue: Hello! Thank you for choosing AcmeBrands. How may I assist you? I want to buy some stuff and  have a question! Of course! I'm glad to help you with that. what has to happen to cancel a subscription? I'm sorry to hear that you wish to cancel your subscription! Is there a particular reason? im just thinkign about it I understand. You are eligible to cancel your subscription at any time, and you will not incur charges for future months after that time. Where the current month is concerned, you will still be responsible for the full amount due, and you will continue to receive your subscription services throughout the end of the month. Is there anything more I may help you with today? No that is all Thank you so much for contacting AcmeBrands customer service. Goodbye!

input: Dialogue: Hi! How can I help you today? Hi i got this shirt and got a bad pasta stain on it Do you have any info how to get it out? I do! Rinse the stain in cold water and wash it immediately. If the stain has dried, soak the shirt in cold water for about an hour to loosen up the stain. Then scrub out the area with dish-washing liquid, preferably with a toothbrush. Then wash agai Wash again in cold water* I hope that works for you! Wow great advice thank you Is there anything else I can help you with today? You're very welcome! No thanks Okay, have a great night! And good luck :)

target: search faq [none]; search for jacket [none]
input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you? Hi I am thinking about getting a jacket and have a question about it it's the calvin klein jacket I'm curious how easy it would be to take out stains like wine or paint? Quite easy, actually. From our knowledge base: To remove a wine stain from the jacket, wet a cotton cloth and gently dab it on the stained area. Then, sprinkle some salt on the area and let it sit for five minutes or more, absorbing the excess water. Next, pour some boiled water on the area to flush out the stain. Finally, you can launder the jacket with the hottest water setting to completely remove any residual marks. When drying, either line dry the jacket or use a low-heat dryer. salt? hmm I would have never thought of it ok cool thanks for that Is there anything else I can help you with? no that's it Okay, have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? I really like the look of these jeans, but I'm worried about how they will hold up over time. How often do you recommend washing them? Assuming a normal rate of wear, we recommend washing our jeans once a week. Excessive washing can cause the color to fade. What is the normal rate of wear? Usually 2-3 times in a week. ok, thanks If you have been working, playing sports, or they are just plain dirty, they should be washed as soon as possible. That makes sense Is there anything else I can answer for you today? No, I think that's it, thanks! Ok we also recommend folding them inside-out, cold wash them, and hang them out to dry for optimal conditions. oh thanks!! that seems to make sense too. Enjoy your jeans and have a great day. thanks, you too

input: Dialogue: hello Hi, how can I help you? can you explain the premium membership tier to me?  just wanted to see the benefits before i join thanks Sure thing, one second while I pull it up. sure We have Bronze, Silver, and Gold memberships. input: Dialogue: Welcome to AcmeBrands, how may I help you? Hi, I want to check the status of subscription No problem, to get started, can I get your full name? Norman Bouchard Hi Norman, and what do you want to know about your subscription? Yea, so I heard that it was removed from my account, but I still want it there The expedited shipping and special discounts are nice Sure, and how did you hear about this? Through an email Ok, let me look into what happened So after checking my system, it seems that no such email was sent out Really? Are you sure? Cuz I have an email from Acme Best Deals saying otherwise Well, there you have it then.  All emails from our marketing team are from AcmeBrands, you have likely encountered some type of scammer Are you serious? That does seem like it.  First off, your subscription is still active And second, this email does not sound like it was from the right sender Can you please just check one more time What would you like me to check?  The subscription status? Yes, can you please check the subscription status? Ok, I just checked and it does seem you have a payment due soon, but otherwise you should be good to go Ok, i see Thanks then is there anything else I can help you with? No, that's it thanks You're welcome

input: Dialogue: Hi! How can I help you today? Are you there? hi sorry yes i am here I want to change my order I ordered quick shipping but then I decided that's too expensive I want to move my shipping to next week delivery so that I can avoid paying the fee No problem, just a moment! okay Do you need anything from me to do this? I will, but firstly the best thing I can do is refund you for the shipping. Will that be fine? Okay yes, so I still get the item quickly but I don't have to pay? That's A-okay with me :) Oh no, my apologies! I can delay the delivery. oh, okay sure that's good too I need your first name or account ID please 8UFPPFPH9U Again, my apologies. I need to validate the purchase, to do this I'm going to need your username, email address, and order ID please. okay my email is asandersisgreat@gmail.com My username is asandersiscool my order id is 5773256933 Great! One moment please. Actually I am going to need your full name as well. Albert Sanders but you can call me Al :) Haha, that is cool. so can you change the shipping? Al, what what is the shipping status at the moment? it's out for delivery I see, since its out for delivery I cannot change the date as I thought before, what is your membership level? it's guest Unfortunately Al, as a guest member you are not eligible for any shipping refunds. oh okay I guess that makes sense. I am truly sorry for the inconvenience. I made the mistake by ordering the quicker shipping it's okay thanks for trying I understand, I wish we could help. no problem Is there anything else I can do for you today? thanks anyway no that's it Great, again you have my sincere apologies, have a good day you also

input: Dialogue: Hi! How can I help you today? Why am I being charged more for the dress that was half the price yesterday Upon ordering I thought I would get yesterday's price.  It was before midnight when I ordered I'm sure that's frustrating. I would be happy to look into that for you. What is your full name? Alessandro Phoenix I will also need your account ID and order ID, please 1161885679 A0BWPEGQXQ Our pricing algorithms will often dynamically change the price of an item depending on a number of factors, such as market size and demand. I can understand your frustration, especially because you placed the order before midnight. I would be happy to generate a promo code for you, as an apology for the inconvenience and frustration. Does that sound good? A promo code? Would that change the price I pay for the dress back to what it was yesterday How much was the difference in price? $20 I cannot authorize more than a $10 refund, which is why I offered the promo code. Would you like me to forward this to my manager so that he can reach out to you for a resolution? I can notify him, generate a promo code, or offer a refund of $10. I would like the price that I saw while ordering it whatever you need to do please and thank you very much I cannot do that, so I will forward this issue to my manager. Is there anything else I can help you with? ok okay, have a great day.

I will need your email and order ID. Along with your username. Email is jw320724@email.com Username is jw320724 order ID is 2599398799 Alright, now I will need your membership level. I'm at Bronze level. Why do you need my membership level to make a return? So... Can I make the return? Depending on the level of membership, your order information would have to meet certain criteria. For example, your bronze membership means you can return as long as: your order was purchased within the past 90 days OR you have your receipt OR it is still in the original packaging. It is not in the original packaging, but I did purchase it less than 90 days ago. Then based on your membership level, you will be able to return your jacket. I will need your address for the shipping label. 8576 Primrose Ave Brighton, MI 99807 Would you like to return in the store, by mail, or at a drop-off center. By mail, please. Alright, your return is set up. Your shipping label will be emailed to you so you can print it off. Will that be all for today? That's everything. Thanks! Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Thanks for contacting AcmeBrands! How can I help you today? Hello - I would like upgrade my order to overnight shipping because I need my order as soon as possible... Okay. Can you provide me with your full name and order ID? Joyce Wu. Order ID: 1816957848 Thank you. I'll pull up your account. What is the shipping status of your order? My status shows "in transit." Unfortunately, an order that is in transit cannot be updated with overnight shipping. However, this does mean that you will be receiving your order today or tomorrow at the latest. Okay - thank you very much for your help... and your explanation makes sense. It's already on the way, so that's all you can do! That will work for me... You're welcome! I just want to be sure you have it. Oh, it is rdomingo1 Oh! I'll make a note of it, thanks. I appreciate that you removed the offending subscription! As long as you don't pay it it will not renew. input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? I was wondering if I could get an extension on my subscription because I just need a little bit more time till my paycheck comes in so I can buy the stuff that I need. Of course, let me see what I can do These are trying times, so I'm sure we can work something out May I just gather some information from you so that I can take a look at your account? I'll need your full name, Account ID, and Order ID And my manager would also like to know your membership level Joseph Banter LVCCES3IVX My order ID is 6533121842 I'm a bronze member Oh, I'm sorry to say that extensions are only available at this time to our Silver and Gold members So there's nothing you can do There is not, sorry I could put in a request with my manager, but I can't make any promises Can I talk to the manager then possibly? Yes, but she's currently very busy with a lot of other calls. If I could take down your phone number, my manager will get back to you as soon as possible Ok, that sounds good. My number is (572) 255-7592 I'm very sorry about that, but I hope things work out for soon. Is there anything else that I could possibly help with while we're here? Thanks for your help, that's all I Need Okay.  Have a good day, Mr. Banter, and the manager will be in touch soon Ok thanks

input: Dialogue: Hello! What can I do for you today? Hi.  My name is Crystal Minh.  I recently purchased a Tommy Hilfiger jacket for $64, but would like to return it. My Order ID is 3944812166. I'll be happy to help you with that, Crystal. Can I have your account ID, please? Sorry, actually, your email address. I do not have that information.  My username is cminh026 and email is cminh026@email.com, if that helps. Yes, my apologies, I made a mistake. One moment, please. Got it, thanks! What is the reason that you want to return? It is too small. Okay, and what is your membership level? Guest Okay. When was the item purchased? If it's within the last 30 days, it'll be no problem. And if it's longer than that, I can still process it for you if you have a receipt. Ok. Do you have the receipt? Yes I have the receipt. Great, then I'll process this for you right away! input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? Hi, I need to return the jacket i purchased because its the wrong color Oh, I'm sorry to hear that, but we should be able to get this squared away If I could just gather some information from you, I'll take a look at your account, and we'll take it from there Sure no problem may I ask your full name, username, email address, and the Order ID of this purchase Name: David Williams Email Address: davidwilliams437@email.com Username: davidwilliams437 Order ID: 9282557005 Thanks, Mr. Williams.  And may I ask your membership level with us? Bronze So if you have your receipt, or if the item is in its original packaging, I can process a return for you right away.  And even without either of those things, as long as the purchase was made in the last 90 days, you'll still be in good shape The item is still in its packaging but i dont have the receipt on me That's perfect.  Any one of those three conditions is sufficient if you'd like, I can send you a shipping label that you can put right on the box and then send that back to us for a refund.  Or, if you'd prefer, you could take it to a local store or a drop-off center Shipping label is great Okay, if I could just confirm your address, I'll send it right out to you Address: 9205 Primrose Ave  Raleigh, WA 5667 Okay, we're all set Is there anything else I can help you with today? No thats it Excellent, have a great day, Mr. Williams you too thanks

input: Dialogue: Hi, how can I assist you? Hello, I tried to purchase a jacket but my credit card was rejected. Sorry, to hear that. Can I please have your name and account number? My name is Chloe Zhang, can you clarify what you mean by account number? Thanks Ms. Zhang. I don't need the account number. Can you please try entering your credit card number again? input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? Hi. I'm trying to track my order, but the delivery time is not when it should be. Could you check on that for me? Yes I can, give me a moment to find what I need to help you Thanksh Can I have your full name? Yes. My name is Crystal Minh And your account and order ID's/ My account ID is CTWIHZILEF and the order ID is 9398799915 Okay and you're checking because you think the delivery time is incorrect? Yes. It is supposed to be here on the 25th and it is saying that it will not be here until the 27th. Okay, just to be 100% sure can I have your username and email? I can give you my phone number if that would help. I do not have a username or email. Because, and I'm sorry to be pedantic, that's a delivery date issue, not a delivery time issue. Ahhh, are you sure you're having an issue with what day the package is supposed to arrive? And not what time of day? Oh, I understand. I'm sorry. I misread and it was changed back to the 25th, but the time is still incorrect form the original time. It should be earlier in the day. Okay, no worries. Let me look into the system. No username or email needed. Thank you Can I ask the shipping status? The address is 7798 Primrose Ave, San Lima, TX 64061 No not your address, the shipping status of your order. I'm so sorry. It says delivered. Well if it's at your house there's really not much we can do to change the time of delivery CAn you tell me why it would be delivered later than stated I don't want to have this issue again The system said that we did everything right on our end, so it may have been an error on your end. Okay, I see. Thank you for your time. And the package is already at your house so we can't slow it down. Is there anything else I can do for you today? No, that is all. Thanks again Have a nice day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. How may I help you? Hi there, I bought a t-shirt and it has a stain, so I'd like to return it.  Can you tell me how to go about doing that? Sure thing, I'll see what I can do to setup a return for you. Thank you so much, I really appreciate that. Could you provide me with your Full name or account ID? Absolutely.  My name is Joyce Wu. Thank you Joyce I was able to pull up your account. I'll also need your Username, Email and order ID so I can confirm the purchase. Could I have those please? My username is jwu36800, my e-mail is jwu36800@email.com, and my order ID is 9090034923. Great, everything looks good. Next could you tell me your membership level and date of purchase? Sure.  I purchased the shirt on 11-12-2019 and my membership level is Gold. Perfect. Let's get the return setup. Great. :) I'll need your full address so that I can get a shipping label sent to you. Could you provide me with that? My address is 9843 Lexington Ave.  Newark, NY 96534 Alright and the last thing I'll need to know is how you would like to go about your return. We can di it by mail. in store or at a drop off center. Which would you prefer? Mail is fine. Alright Joyce, you're all set and should receive a shipping label shortly! Was there anything else I could do for you? Oh no that was all I had questions about, thank you for helping. :) No problem. I hope you have a great day! You too!

input: Dialogue: Hello, this is AcmeBrands customer service. How may I help you? Hi I have a question about a purchase I made. I bought a pair of jeans and when I went to put it in the wash I noticed that it had a stain on it. I wanted to see if I can return it Okay, may I have either your full name or account ID? My name is Joseph Banter I will need to validate your purchase. May I have your username, email address, and order ID? ok my user name is jbanter3 my email is jbanter3@email.com let me check the order ID 0755620887 it's the Guess Jeans Okay, what is your membership level? It's bronze And when was the purchase made? You can return it if it was within the last 90 days. Are you still there? Sir, are you still there to complete your return? yeo yes Great, when was your purchase made? January 11, 2020 Excellent, I will print out a shipping label for you. I will need your full address. Ok, it is 2909 Lexington Ave, Brighton, WA 28753 Thank you, how would you like to process the return? Options are "by mail", "in store", or "drop off center" by mail please Done, is there anything else you would like help with? no that was it Okay, thank you for being a valued customer.  Have a nice day.

input: Dialogue: Hi there Hello and thank you for contacting us! What can I help you with today? I can't add items to my cart. It's simply not updating I'm sorry about the issue, And I'll see what I can do to help troubleshoot it. To start Can I have your first and last name? Sanya Afzal Thank you Sanya. So currently you are unable to add items to the cat and it is not updating? Correct. Alright, let's try a few things to see if we can get it fixed. Let's go. Firstly have you tried refreshing the page? I know it's simple but sometimes we forget to try that. I did. Didn't do anything Alright, next let's try logging in an out to see if that clears up the issue? Yeah, that did it. Could you check the bottom left side of the product page for me? there's a chance the item may actually be out-of-stock. The logging out and in again already worked. Thanks Oh awesome! I'm glad that fixed it! Was there anything else I can help you with today? No, thank you. Thatnks for shopping with us! have a great day! bye

Chloe, I'm going to write up a report to give to our Purchasing Department to let them know that you've inquired about this item being out of stock. input: Dialogue: Hello. How may I help you today? Hello. I have a question for you. I am 78 and I don't use the internet a lot, so I might have messed something up I wanted to order one pair of jeans for my grandchild Ok What can I help you with? But when I looked at my emal, it said that I had ordered two pairs *email Oh i see. May I have your name please? Sanya Afzal Lets get this sorted out. Can I also have the account ID and Order ID? my account is CBWV4GIKSP my order is 2816406664 I was so surprised to see that email today. I get nervous using the internet and I wonder if I made a mistake I was sure that I only ordered one pair of jeans It was supposed to be one pair but it shows two? yes the email says two It does look like a mistake on that email. One moment please. Oh phew What is the shipping status? I was so upset The email says "out for delivery" I am not sure what that means Ok let me see. One moment please Alright seeing that it is out for delivery you should get the package today. Once you get the package you will have to contact us again. Oh no I don't want two pairs of jeans Okay. Then will you help me return the extra pair? Also, I don't want to be charged for two pairs. I live on a pension and money is tight You will need to call back and we can start the return process if needed. We will get that fixed when the package arrives because it depends if you need to return one or just get a refund for one. Okay. Thank you for helping me with this SHould be able to get it sorted this afternoon. Contact us when the package arrives. All right. I will Thanks and talk to you later.

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? Hi! I was trying to make a purchase but I noticed that the item is way overpriced on your site compared to the competition. I am not sure why is there a price discrepancy I see, well let's see what we can find out about this. May I have your full name or Account ID? Rodriguez Domingo And you this price difference from a competitor correct? Sorry noticed this price difference yes thats correct A lot different Did you already place an order? I would like to make the purchase I see.  Well unfortunately I cannot change the price of an item.  We use pricing algorithms and they dynamically change all the time. But the same item is way overpriced Is there anything you can do about that? Well what I can do is offer you a discount for this item since we appreciate your business. Appreciate it. Thank you Enter this promo code R44UK and that should help drastically. Thank you You are very welcome.  Is there anything else I can help you with today? Thats all, Thank you very much You have a wonderful rest of your day and thanks again for shopping with us! you too

input: Dialogue: Hi, thanks for contacting AcmeBrands. How can I help you? I am looking at a cool pair of jeans, but I'm worried about how often they will need to be washed. If you are new to the site, you will have a guest membership, which gives you free returns in the first 30 days after purchase. That is good Higher membership tiers, which come from frequent purchasing, allow you 90 days, 6 months, and then unlimited returns, as you go up the tiers. Can I help you with anything else today? That's is all good info Okay, have a great day! Thanks.

It is a Tommy Hlfiger shirt For $59 Sure, can I get your first name so I can better address you? Sanya Thanks Sanya. What would you like to know about that shirt? Do you know the materials? Also do you have it in small? Our shirts are made of 100% natural fibers, most are 90% cotton and 10% linen. As far as sizes available, you can check on the website, if the website is showing "empty" then we are currently out of stock in that size. Awesome. Thank you They are usually refilled at the start of the second week of every month though, so you can check back then. Will do. You're welcome. Did you need assistance with anything else? Nope Alright, then have a fantastic day! You too

input: Dialogue: Thank you for being an AcmeBrands customer! How may I assist you? Hi, I want to cancel the order for a shirt I just made. I need it in a bigger size. Can I get a refund? Let's see what we can do. May I have your full name? Alessandro Phoenix So the order has not been shipped, right? If it has, we would need to process it as a return instead. Okay, I think I'll just get the refund then. Will you send a return label to me? Yes, but I will need some information from you first. May I have your username, email address, and order ID in order to validate the purchase? i don't think it has shipped though. I didn't get an email that it did Username: alessandrophoenix738 That's fine. We'll just need to verify the purchase and then we can move on to the next step. here is the order number 3624309547 And your email address? alessandrophoenix738@email.com it was $69 Thanks! Would you like the refund as a gift card, added to the value in your account, paper check, or directly refunded to your credit card? refunded to my debit card please how long till I get the refund? Okay. It won't take very long. I just need your account ID and we'll be almost finished. where do I find that? It should be with your order ID and email address, I would think. If that's not available, we may have to process this as a return instead. username? No, sorry. Do you see anything that says a shipping status? It would be something like order received, out for delivery, delivered. No nothing, just the order statement with the order ID 3624309547 Hmm, ok. Do you see any numbers near your name? Besides the order ID, I mean. no, can't you pull it up? you have all my info I can't, unfortunately. I'll make a note in your account and move on. what? I still get my refund though right?' Yes. The amount was $69, correct? yes thank you Is there anything else you need? no Okay. Have a nice day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? I just looked at my order status and it looks like  I was a charged an extra fee for my jacket? why? can you take it off? I see, let's see what we can find out and do about this, one moment. May I have you full name or Account ID? Alessandro Phoenix I will need to verify your identity with a couple more items, your account ID and Order ID if you don't mind. Account ID: 535OY5YXI1 Order ID: 3172257307 Thank you for that.  Give me a moment to look in the system and get an answer for you. ok Do you know your membership level off-hand? bronze I see. Well apparently there was a price surge as your ordered due to supply and demand.  Unfortunately there is nothing I can do on my end. oh, i wish they would have told me.  I don't want the item for that price Sadly this is up to the algorithms and not me.  My apologies. ok Is there anything else I can help you with today? no thanks You have a wonderful rest of your day! you too

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? The site is really slow. I wonder what's going on? I'm sorry to hear that.  Let me see if there is anything I can do to try to fix that for you Thnx First off, just to make sure, are all websites slow for you today, or is it just ours? Just yours I see.  May I ask that you log out and then log right back in.  We've been having some minor issues with shopping carts today, and simply resetting the site seems to be helping others OK If you'd like to try that, we can still stay connected even as you log out of the store I did it but it's still slow I see. In that case, I'll write up a report for our internal team so that they can get to work on finding out what the issue is. OK. But is there a way you can help me right now? I can place your order for you, if you'd like if you know which item you would like to purchase, I can take down your credit card number and expiration date No I haven't decided yet I'd like to keep browsing Okay.  The only other option would be to close down any other programs and browser tabs you might have running.  That can sometimes speed things up a bit Of course, that would mean that we wouldn't be able to stay talking, but we'll be here if you need any help later Is there anything else I can help you with for now? OK I'll try that No that's it. Thanks Okay, well I hope that works out for you soon.  Have a good day.

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? Hey I was just wondering...  I wanted to make more purchases and since I'm planning on making more frequent purchases, how do I sign up for a premium membership? Happy to help, may I have your full name please? Yeah it's Norman Bouchard. thanks Norman. You're welcome. What is your membership level now? Right now it's Gold. great, let me check for you. Just a second. Take your time, and thank you. Premium membership can be earned by a gold member from $2000 of purchases. And you also need to fill in a short questionnaire. So just answer a questionnaire and buy $2,000 worth of items and then I have a premium membership? Yes, you are right. Okay, will I get the questionnaire in my e-mail after I purchase enough items to hit that 2k limit? Yes, that's correct. Okay!  Thanks that sounds easy. Great, is there anything else that I can help you with? No that was it.  Thanks though. :) Have a nice day! You too!

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? I retured a item a while back but cannot locate the credit? Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.  Let me see if I can get this cleared up for you May I ask your full name to begin? Norman Bouchard Thanks, Mr Bouchard I'll check with our system to try to figure out what the problem is.  One moment, please Okay, the good news is that our system does show that a credit has been issued to your account, and that hasn't been used, so it should still be available to you There may be a problem in the customer interface If you log out and then log back in, are you able to see the credit on your account? are we still connected, Mr. Bouchard? sorry That's no problem. I tried that and it worked Ah, I'm glad to hear that Thank you! So it looks like you're in good shape.  Is there anything else I can help with while we're here? no thanks again You're welcome.  Have a great day

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? Hello! Hi I think there is a problem with my order Okay, let's see if we can get this sorted out.  What seems to be the problem? I see ther is an extra fee added to it. Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.  If I can take a look at your account, I'll see why that came about I'll just need to gather some information from you to verify the details sure May I ask your full name, Account ID, the Order ID, and your membership level, if you have it ok My name is Norman Bouchard, acc id is MIZUV3HC04, the order id is 3588578842, and I'm a bronze member Thanks, Mr. Bouchard You are welcome But I'm sorry to say that the extra fee added onto your account was not actually an error Then what happened? Sadly, it wasn't well explained on the final receipt, but we've had to initiate a small additional fee so that we could give hazard pay to our warehouse staff Oh, I see. That makes sense. I'm very sorry that this wasn't made clear up front, and that it came as a surprise That wans't your fault. Thanks anyway. You're welcome.  Is there anything else that I could assist you with while we're here? Nope, That's all for today. Okay, have a good day, Mr. Bouchard You too

input: Dialogue: Hi, how can I help you today? Hello, I was wondering if you could tell me when the annual sale ends? The annual sale occurs during the early months of the year usually during the last week of January. This year, the annual sale started on January 23rd and ended on January 31st. If you missed it this time around, please make sure to subscribe to our Will you be having any similar sales? No, we do not. We will offer promo codes from time to time to keep on the lookout for those. How do I get those? THey will just send them to you Like through my phone? or a subscription service? Through an email Is there anything else I can help you with? No, thank you Have a nice day!

input: Dialogue: Hello! How may I help you? Hello! My name is Chloe. I'm reaching out today to inquire about the status of my package. The tracking said it was delivered but I have not received it. Sure! May I have your full name? Yes, my name is Chloe Zhang. Thank you, Chloe. If you could review the order status I would appreciate it. May I now have Username, Email and Order ID in order to see the order? Sure! My username is cz477514. My email address is: cz477514@gmail.com and my Order ID is 1442889983 It seems this was an error on our part and it has not yet come. How long have you been waiting for it? That is sad news. I have been waiting for 5 days now. It usually is not considered missing or late until past a week. It should come any day now. If not we can replace it for you. At this point I am concerned as this is highly unusual. It would be most appreciated if you could arrange a replacement shipment. I am sorry, I cannot do so until it has been over a week. The email you got that it came was also shown to be incorrect by our system. If you could wait just a few more days it should arrive. I see, is there a way an exception could be made? If the missing package ever arrives I will be sure to send it back, at least this way I can be sure of it. It's telling our system you should still get it any-day now. I cannot issue a new order at this time. Very sorry. Is there anything else I can help you with today? I understand, no worries. I hope it arrives! I have no further questions today. Thank you for your patience. Thank you! Have a good day!

input: Dialogue: good morning, how can I help you? Hi.  My name is Rodriguez Domingo.  I have a question about these Michael Kors jeans for $69. What is the process to remove a grass stain from them? sure, tell me about it ok, one moment ok i am going to indicate the process to remove those stain. Ok. soak a household sponge in undiluted white vinegar and dab lightly on the stained area. Dry with paper towels and repeat the treatment as needed. additional to this to preserve the color, reverse the jeans inside out, and then throw your jeans in the washing machine and launder That would be all Mr. Rodriguez Great I will try those steps.  Thank you.

input: Dialogue: Hi there.... Thank you for contacting Acme.  How can I help? I signed up for a premium subscription recently. I looked at my billing statement yesterday and noticed that I was double charged. Is there anything I can do about that? Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.  Let me take a look and see if I can clear this up Thank you. :) May I gather some information from you to verify the account details? Absolutely. I'll need your full name, Account ID, and the Order ID of any recent purchase My name is Rodriguez Domingo. My account ID is YBGEUK7NYU My order ID is 2471080431 Thanks, Mr. Domingo and what is your membership level with us? It's Silver. How much were you overcharged by? $19.24 It just appears twice like it was a glitch or something charging me twice for the subscription. Yes, I'm very sorry about that I can see the problem in our system, now It's alright, things happen. I'll refund that to you right away Thank you I really appreciate that. And you're all set.  Is there anything else I can help with? No that was it, thank you so much for your help!  :) You're welcome.  Have a great day You too!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? Hello. I have a big issue with my premium subscription I was already having a really hard day today. My kids are home because of the virus and I'm trying to work from home, and everything is just so hard. Then, I saw that you had charged me twice for my subscription That's not fair! I am not going to pay twice! You need to fix this! I'm sorry for the inconvenience, can I get your full name, please? Crystal Minh Thanks, Crystal, I'll also need your Account ID and Order ID. my account is TTNP7OPMNU my order is 1208103826 Thank you, and may I know your membership level? Bronze Okay, let me check the system here to see what's going on. It does appear that this is a mistake on our end, if you could confirm the amount you were overcharged I can reverse it right away. Okay I was charged $120 My subscription was only supposed to cost $60 Okay, I've issued your refund of $60. Is there anything else I can help you with? Oh good I am glad to know that I won't be charged twice, on top of everything else that I'm dealing with right now I don't need anything else Have a good day!

input: Dialogue: Hello. how may I help you today? Hey, so I'm trying to get this shirt but it's always out of stock. Every time I check, it's not available. What's going on? Its possible that we are out. What shirt are you looking for? It's a Tommy Hilfiger shirt; it's $64 I really want it I can let the purchasing depart know so they can get some more in stock. May I have your name please? Sure, it's Sanya Afzal I can also place an order for you so that when it comes it we can ship it to you. So, will I get a notification? I don't want to just be charged for it right away. Do you want me to order this for you? You will be charged right away. Okay, that's fine. Will you use the same CC that is on file? Yeah, that works for me. Ok I placed that order. As soon as we get it in we will ship it to you. Any idea approximately when it will be back in stock? Not sure. Depends on Tommy Hilfiger Anything else I can help you with? That was it, thank you. Great. Have a nice day.

input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for reaching out to AcmeBrand today. How may I help you? Hi I am having an issue with looking for the products I want to buy. Are you having issues with your site? I havent had any reports on the site being down today but I'll happily help you try to get the issue resolved. It sounds like your search function isnt actiong properly? acting* yeah I'm trying to look for the michael kors boots but I get jeans Alright let's try a few things to see if we can get it fixed. First could you try logging out and back into your account to see if that clears up anything? ok hold on no that didn't work Alright, you mentioned that the items were coming back incorrect. That sounds like it might be a cookie issue. On your browser there should be a button that says "More Details". Click on that and select reset cookies then try the search again. See if that helps at all. ok let me try that hey it worked! thanks so much! Awesome, I'm glad we were able to figure out what was wrong! Was there anything else I could help with today? no that's it Thank you for shopping with us. Have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? Hi I have a question about an order I made. Of course, what is your question? I bought a pair of jeans as a birthday present but I was just told it was the wrong color. I was wondering if I could return it> Well let's make sure.  May I have your full name or account ID? Norman Bouchard my username is nbouchard495 Fantastic, may I also have your email address and order ID to check this purchase? nbouchard495@email.com 0775415657 There we go.  Do you know your membership level? guest One more question, is your purchase date within the last 30 days? no it was at the end of December last year Oh I see.  Do you still have your receipt? yeah I have it somewhere Since you still have your receipt, we can initiate a return.  I will need a little bit of info to get you a shipping label. ok great May I have your full address including city, state and zipcode? 5492 Kennedy St  San Lima, MI 11276 One last question in regards to how you would like to return this item.  By Mail, In Store or use a Drop Off Center.  Which would you prefer? mail Fantastic everything is in place and you can begin your return. great thank you! Is there anything else I can help you with today? that's it thanks again Thank you and have a wonderful rest of your day!

input: Dialogue: Hello, thanks for contacting AcmeBrands. How can I help you today? Hi!  I got this pair of jeans the other day and they have a damn stain on them! I want to return them Oh no! So sorry to hear that. I'd be happy to help you out though. Can I get your full name please? Alessandro Phoeni Phoenix sorry No problem. Can I get your username, e-mail address and the order ID as well please? user- alessandrophoenix357 email- alessandrophoenix375@email.com order- 1307833917 This really sucks man!  I needed those jeans for my hipsters ball coming up next week! Great thanks. Do you know what membership level you are on? I'm gold baby! Ballin! Always That means you get unlimited returns. So let me get started on that for you. How does a new pair of jeans have a stain anyways? was the dang mailman tryin them on or WHAT?! Can I get your address so I can send out a shipping label, so you can return that stained item? Yeah, sounds like there is a rogue UPS or Fedex delivery man out there. I'm at 1087 Lincoln Ave, San Mateo CA 84667 You can come over later if you want Great, give me one second here to enter this into the system. Once you get that shipping label, how would you like to send that back to us? We have several options available. By Mail, In Store, or Drop off at a local shipping center I'd like to do it the laziest way as possible, please.  Oh, and threw away that package.  It might have coronavirus on it! Blech! Mail, so I can shame the delivery man Ok, by mail is probably the option you're going to want to go with then you can just leave it for your mail person to pick up I'll ask him how he liked them Ok great Alright, all set. Is there anything else I can help you with? Naw, that's all for now.  I have to find a new outfit to wear now though. Geez. You've been great though so thank you If you want to go to the hipsters ball with me you know where to find me Not a problem, happy to help! Have a fantastic day! Sounds good!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how may I help you today? Hello! :) I messed up my order, and I'm hoping to be able to remove an item from it today... I was thinking about buying the second item on my order, but I decided against it and would like to remove it. :) Sure I would love to help you with that. To start, can I please have your full name or account ID? Joyce Wu Account Number is 7ACCLFK1S9 Give me a moment please. Just to be sure, did you accidentally order two items when you meant to order only one? Yes, I meant to order only the boots but I ordered the jacket too... Can I please have your order ID? My order ID is 0480408183 Thank you can you please tell me the shipping status of your order? It has been delivered, apparently... I should be asking about a return, I guess. ;) Oh, no problem. Can you please tell me your membership level? Silver I can offer you an immediate refund. So, you have already received the item? That would be great! Yes, will I need to return it? Shall I get a free shipping label? Yes, one moment please Are you still there? Yes Can I please have the price of the item you are returning? $54 Thank you so much! Your refund of $54 has been processed. Thank you! I appreciate your help. Is there anything else I can help you with today? No, that's it. I just need to know if I'm supposed to return the item. Yes, you should call customer support and ask for a return shipping label. Ok, thank you! Is there anything else? No that's it Thank you. Have a great day! Thanks, you too! :)

Would you like me to order the product for you? No thank you. I will wait and see if the site is working again. Okay, is there anything else I can help you with? Are you still there? I think so let me try that now Great! hey that seemed to work! my search is normal now sort of weird there. Wonderful! Is there anything more I may help you with today? that's it thanks for the tip I will be sure to write up a report for our website team to let them know how they can do a better job in the future. ok Thank you so much for contacting AcmeBrands customer service. Goodbye!

The policy on returns depends on your membership level. Okay Our Gold members receive unlimited returns. Silver members may return items purchased within the last 6 months. Bronze members are given 90 days to return. Finally, all other members may return for up to 30 days following purchase. Is there anything more I may help you with today? Thabks Thanks That will be all Thank you so much for contacting AcmeBrands customer service. Goodbye!

target: pull up the costumer account [chloe zhang]; verify costumer identity [chloe zhang, tl2ebl76gd, 7466453187]; get shipping status [in transit]; check membership level [guest]
input: Dialogue: Thank you for shopping with AcmeBrands! How may I assist you? Hello! Is there any way i can add an item onto an order i just placed? I forgot to get it in my cart I can find out! May I have your full name? Name: Chloe Zhang Account ID: TL2EBL76GD incase you need it and im sure you need the order id 7466453187 Thanks, that helps! :D Do you know the shipping status of your order? Its already in transit, but i just placed my order hours ago, you guys are good! We aim to please! Although maybe a little slower would have helped more in this situation. What is your membership level? very true, i was hoping that was just an automated message. I am guest level Unfortunately, as a guest, I cannot do anything to ship it out automatically for you. You will need to place a new order. I apologize for the inconvenience. What if, i place this order and my membership status goes UP, i believe i am right on the cusp, would i then be able to combine orders maybe? I'm sorry, it wouldn't be in effect until the order after that. Is there anything else I can help you with? and with how quick you guys are probably long gone, nope i guess that it. I saw the shirt cheaper on amazon anyways, oh well. I'm sorry, I know it's not what you wanted to hear. Its a little disappointing, but ill make due with the jeans and get the shirt cheaper i guess Okay. Thanks again!

input: Dialogue: Hello, how can I help you today? I ordered a pair of guess jeans for my daughter's birthday and they never arrived. Let me take a look for you. To start, could I get your full name and account number please? Albert Sanders, albertsanders226 Alright. To pull up the order I need your username, the email address associated with the order, and the order number. Do you have those handy? Username is albertsanders226 my email is albertsanders226@email.com order number 3814612607 OK. How long has it been since you placed the order for the missing item? its been over 3 weeks now, so I am concerned the order is lost That makes sense. There is no reason that it should have taken that long. I will go ahead and ship you out a replacement order. Could I confirm your home address where you would like the item shipped? Thank you, that  sounds great. My daughter's B-day is in two weeks We should be able to get it there in plenty of time. What is your home address where you want it shipped\ 9835 2nd Ave. Jacksonvill NY 89693 Alright, I just submitted an order to get a replacement pair of the Guess Jeans sent out to you. Sorry for the confusion Is there anything else I can help you with? no, thanks again No problem. Have a great day.

input: Dialogue: Hi I have an issue with an item Hi thanks for contacting AcmeBrands. What seems to be the issue? I need a new jacket because I am going on a trip to see the Northern Lights in Canada soon I like this jacket on your site But it's soooo overpriced I can get it on other prices for much less I am very frustrated by this because I like your site and I am loyal to you But I don't want to spend more money You are selling this Guess jacket for $95 I mean $94 Ok sure. I understand where you are coming from. I have seen it on other sites for like $40 or so To begin, can I get your full name or Account ID please? David Williams KOCHTRCZKI Thank you Mr. Williams. So, our competitors are offering that item at a lower price than us, correct? Yes they are Why is your item so much more money? I can look into that for you. But first I'm going to need your Order ID please. Okay, it's 1867616599 Thanks. I understand your frustration, the reason sometimes our prices are more expensive is that our pricing is determined on the fly by an AI algorithm. Okay but they made a mistake this time So they can change dynamically. Can you offer the jacket to me for less I am a loyal Silver member I do apologize for the inconvenience. What I can do is offer you a promo code if you would like? Yes that would be great I have seen the jacket for $40 elsewhere So I would like at least 50% off Ok, what I can do is generate a promo code for you for $54 off Yes!!! That would be great so that should bring the price down to $40 Then I can wear the jacket in Canada Absolutely. Thank so much This means a lot to me Your promo code is 6WVVA. Great! I am very happy with this You're welcome. We value your business. That's all I needed Is there anything else I can help you with? Thanks for your help Alright then, have a fantastic day! I don't need anything else You also

target: search faq [none]; search for jeans [none]; select topic in faq [how to remove a grass stain]
input: Dialogue: Thanks for contacting AcmeBrands...how can I help you? hi i would like to know about a product before buying Sure! What would you like to know? i am interested in the $74 michael kors jeans how would i remove grass stains from them if they got stained? Let me check on that for you. All you need to do is, when the stain is fresh, soak a household sponge in white vinegar (undiluted), and dab it lightly on the stained area. Dry it with paper towels, and repeat as needed. To preserve the color, turn the jeans inside out, and then put them in the washing machine and wash as usual on the cold water setting. Is there anything else I can help you with today? that was very helpful, thank you for helping me that is all i needed You're welcome, have a great one!

input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. How may I help you? Hello. I'm thinking of placing an order and getting a subscription. But what happens if I pay my subscription fee late? Let me try to find that information for you. One moment. Alright, I found the information you need. I desperately need some new clothing and since we can't go out and shop now i'm dying to buy some stuff! When a payment is made late on a subscription there is a fee added for each day the payment is late at $2 per day. ok, so if I just pay on time, there won't be any extra fees. Gold and silver members have a grace period of 5 days before the fee starts to be added. ok thank you No problem, was there anything else I could help you with today? no that is it Thank you for shopping with us. Have a great day!

Gold I'm happy to inform you that as a gold member I'll be able to give you an extension with no questions asked! I'll go ahead and process that for you now Thank you. How long will it be extended for? The extension should be good for 15 days. If you need longer than that feel free to contact an agent again and we'll be able to help Perfect. Thank you for your time! Not a problem, was there anything else I could help you with? That is everything. Thank you for shopping with us and have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Hi! How can I help you today? Hi I have a question about a recent order I made. Sure, what is your question? I got an email confirmation and saw that it was charged to my credit card but I had wanted to charge my store credit first and then the remainder to my card I wanted to see what happened and if I can adjust it now No problem. I will get this resolved for you. ok gerat great So basically theres a charge on your credit card that should not be there? yes I have a $50 dollar credit in my account. So the purchase was $54 so the credit should have been applied first and then $4 (the remainder) from my credit card Ah. None of the credit was applied to the order? no I still have the $50 credit Great, I see the issue now. so I was wondering if I could apply the store credit and then give me a refund of $50 to my credit card Alright, I have figured it out and am able to do this for you. What is your account ID or full name? 8VEB4XHUH1 Rodriguez Domingo Great, and the Order ID? 7964681251 Has the item shipped? What is the status? It says "out for delivery" Unfortunately this change will only effect future orders. oh no :( It is too late to change that order because it is out for delivery. I am very sorry. oh I see is there anything that can be done at all? I really wish, but unfortunately there is not. Is there anything else I can do for you today? that's it I am sorry once again, you have a good day alright. you too I appreciate it.

input: Dialogue: Hello excuse the delay, how can I help you? I am looking at making some purchases but before I do I was hoping you could let me know more about your premium membership. and welcome to Acme Brands! Thanks! what would you like to know? I would like to know more about your premium membership benefits Why should I sign up for the program? No, I am not a premium member yet I want to know more about the program before joining I am a Bronze member currently and want to know how to get to premium and what I would get if I was premium one of the main benefits is saving on shipping oh ok is shipping free? our silver members can cancel orders at any time yes shipping is free for all levels gold members have unlimited refunds Is Gold the highest? yes, Our gold members get the very beat of everything. Basically, they can do no wrong. We pull out all of the stops for them. Are you interested in joining them? great, so cancel orders anytime, free shipping, free cancels. Anything else? unlimited refunds anything else? there are promo codes for all levels. Gold members always get the benefit of the doubt in any disputes Great. I am interested. How do you join? Oh, and we invite you to our annual holiday party! Very fun! Free transport & open bar! Awesome how do I get to be gold? Membership is based on the amount of purchase you have made Gold members have spent at least $2000 /year ok we also ask them to fill in a brief questionaire Is there anything else I can tell you? great, how much to get to the other levels? Bronze, as you know, is for purchases of at least $500. yes Silver, for $1000 in the previous year ok, thanks for all your help Is there anything else I can do for you today? no, that's it Have a great day! Thanks for being a member

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? I am a gold member Can  you look up by name I don't have my account ID on me righ tnow That's fine, your name alone will be sufficient Rodriguez Domingo Okay, Mr. Domingo, I'll check on the status of those credits now And your account is showing a $40 credit balance, so those have been issued to you So it looks like there might be a problem in our customer interface Ok, so it's there, I'm just not able to see it? Sometimes the gears just get a little stuck, so to speak.  It often clears up if you simply log out of your account, and then log right back in Oh ok, got it, thanks If you could try that now, we'll be able to stay connected even as you log out of the store site Now it shows up for me Ah, that's good to hear Thanks for the help, weird how that happens sometimes It is indeed, but we're always here to help if you have any issues Thanks so much, have a great day Speaking of which, may I assist you with anything else while we're on the line? That's all Ah, you're welcome.  And I hope you have a great day as well Thanks

input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeCorp how may I help you? Hello. I completed a return with you guys and have not seen my charge reverse yet I would happy to look into this for you. Are you wanting to know your refund status? Yes Lets look into your account since you have not since the credit yet. May I have your full name or account ID? If I completed the return, about how long will it take for me to get a refund? Yes, my name is Normal Bouchard Sorry, Norman Bouchard Thank you Norman. To check on this purchase I will need some more info. May I please have your username, email address, and order ID? Username is nb195308, email is nb195308@email.com And order: 3600298749 Thank you, how long have you been waiting for the refund? It's been about 4 days already May I have your membership level? I was told I'd receive a refund 3 business days after I submitted my return Yes, it's bronze Unfortunately, you were given wrong information and I do sincerely apologize. Refunds are issued within 7 days so you will get your refund within the next 3 days. Is there anything else I can help you with today? Okay, and so if I still haven't received my refund then who will I need to contact? You will need to contact us again, Ok thank you!  Thank you for contacting AcmeCorp, you have a great day. You too. Thanks
