input: Dialogue: I was looking at a competitors site and noticed an item is grossly overpriced on your site, do you guys do price matching or anything? Hello. Give me a few moments and I will look into this for you. Did you purchase an item, and are unhappy with the price? Or are you just considering a purchase and wanting to know if we can match a competitors price? just unhappy with the price and wanted to know if you would match Let me see what I can do for you. Can you give me your Full Name or Account ID? Joseph Banter SJ3QTFOJDH Alright thank you very much give me just one moment and I will be back with you Can you provide me with the Order ID please? I didn't order it yet, thats why I wanted the price match Okay. I understand. Thank you for your patience. Unfortunately sometimes pricing is out of our control, Occasionally we can offer a promotion for an existing order when the market shifts dramatically. This may be slightly out of policy but I will go Here you are JV2A8 Thanks I appreciate the help Please keep in mind that is not something we will be able to do every time. But I am happy to be able to provide you with assistance in this occasion. :) Understood Is there anything else I can help you with today? No thats all thank you All right, have a great day!

input: Dialogue: Thank you for contacting Acme.  How may I help you today? I've been trying to search for jeans, but every time I do, it tells me there are no results. Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.  We can try a few different solutions to see if we can get this working again Great, thank you! Are you able to find search results for other items?  For example, if you search for Calvin Klein Boots, do you still get zero results? Let me try. No it still says zero results. I see.  We have had some lingering issues with the search bar recently, but one thing that has worked well is simply logging out and then logging back in.  Sometimes the reset is all it needs.  If you'd like to try that, we can still stay connected e Ok, let me try that. That seemed to work. Ah, good.  Are you able to find the jeans you were looking for? Yes, thank you!! You're very welcome.  Is there anything else I can help with while we're here? No, that was it! Glad to hear it.  Have a great day. Thank you, you too.

input: Dialogue: Hi, how may I help you? Hi, I would like to return something. Sure, let's get started. I will need your full name to begin. It's a pair of boots and they are the wrong color. My name is David Williams. Sorry to hear that David, let's fix that. May I have your username, email address, and order ID? My username is dw190433, email is dw190433@email.com, and order id is 6607366152 Thank you, and what method do you want to be refunded by? Refund to my PayPal would be ideal. Unfortunately we can't process paypal returns right now, Your options are by gift card, paper check, credit card, and adding a credit to your account. I'm very sorry about that. How long does the paper check take? It will take about a week to get to you in the mail Okay, I'll take a paper check. Okay great, I will need your address then. It is 6001 Brushwick Dr  Raleigh, NY 13618 And how much did the boots cost? They were $84. Done, is there anything else you need today? Nothing else. Okay then. Thank you, have a nice day.

input: Dialogue: Hello, this is AcmeBrands customer service. How may I help you? Hi. I'm trying to buy something but my cart won't seem to update when I add it. Okay, have you tried to log out and back into your account? If that doesn't work, try to refresh the page and add the item again. Hello? sorry i'm here, I'm tried both of those and they don't work Okay, please check if the item is out of stock. This information is on the bottom left of the product page. It says the item is in stock. I see, unfortunately we're running out of options for fixing this on your end. If you would like, I can make the purchase for you. Ok please do that. Sure, I will need your credit card number, the expiration date, and the brand/item you are trying to buy. Ok can I get back with you on that? I don't have access to it right now Of course, just get back to customer support when you are ready. Is there anything else I can help you with? nope that is it, thanks. Thank you, have a nice day.

Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I can look into the price on this item, if you'd like? that would be great, thanks! Okay, may I ask your full name or your account ID? my name is Chloe Zhang my account is 51BPNWIWWD And were you checking on an item that you had already ordered when you noticed the competitor's price?  If so, do you have your order ID handy? yes, that's right Order ID: 0988234608 Yes, I can see your order details in our system, but unfortunately, our pricing algorithms often change from day to day based on lots of factors, and the ultimate price that is offered is out of my hands Okay, I'll keep that in mind next time I want to order anything. target: search faq [none]; search for boots [none]
input: Dialogue: Hi how can I help you Hello, I own a pair of Tommy Hilfiger boots and have an issue.  Some gum unfortunately became stuck to my sole, and I would like the best advice regarding how to remove it. No problem Use a butter knife to generously rub a glob of peanut butter over the gum. After 10 to 15 minutes (or depending on how soft the chewing gum was to start with) the gum should start to soften and become one with the peanut butter. Once this happens, sc scrape it off, then clean the rest of your shoe with soap and water to remove any peanut butter or gum remnants. Anything else I can help you with today? I would never have thought of this-very interesting!  What kind of soap would you recommend for cleaning off the peanut butter? Dish soap, it's goo at cutting grease. Thank you, I will get to work on cleaning my shoe! Great!  Anything else today? As I am cleaning the shoes, I was also wondering if they are waterproof? I would treat them as if they are not waterproof.  Just clean the affected are but do not submerge OK Thank you, These are really a nice pair of boots, and I want to do my best to take care of them. Of course Any other questions? Thank you, I think that should help me solve my gum issue. Great. Have a nice day

Thank you Have a nice day.

Maybe you can tell the store to check their colors before they list them. I certainly will.  josephbanter436  josephbanter436@email.com All customer feedback is greatly appreciated 4288798360 Now, what is your membership level? I am Gold. Gold receives unlimited returns. I know. What is your address? 9317 1st Ave  Jacksonville, TX 98268 That's why I love this store--great benefits! They certainly are great! What is your preferred way to process this return? As fast as possible, please. Oh, I mean do you want to do it by mail, in store, or at a drop off center? Oh!  Duh!  By the mail box. Fantastic. You are all set sir! Is there anything else I can do for you today? Thank you for all of your help.  I don't have any other questions.  Bye-bye! Great, have a good day!

input: Dialogue: Hi what can I do for you? Good afternoon! I was hoping you could provide me with a little bit more information about one of your products. In particular, I was thinking of purchasing some Calvin Klein boots for work. However, I am a painter and often get paint splatter on my shoes. As such, I wanted to know how one might remove paint splatter from these particualr shoes Okay I will look for an answer for you  To treat paint stain on your boots, please follow the steps below. 1. Brush off the excess paint. 2. Use a coarse brush or toothbrush to flake off the dried excess paint. 3. Apply a soapy mixture to the stain. 4. Scrape off the softened paint. 5. Ru Is there anything else I can help you with? Steps 5 onward are not readable. Could you paste the remaining steps for me as well please 5. Rub with detergent solution. 6. Apply nail polish remover. I am so sorry about that That's okay! Thank you for your help. I assume this process can be used for any boots, including the ones I would like to purchase? Yes, that is correct ok perfect Is there anything else I can do for you? No that's everything! Thanks again You're welcome, have a good day You too!

target: search faq [none]; search for boots [none]; select topic in faq [how to remove gum]
input: Dialogue: Hello, thank you for contacting AcmeBrands. How can I help you today? So I let my kid sister stomp around in my Tommy Hilfiger boots, and she got gum on the sole. Ugh! Can you help me remove it? Sure, let me see what I can find on gum removal from boots. Thanks! You can use a butter knife to rub peanut butter over the gum.  Then after 10 - 15 minutes the gum should start to soften and can be scraped off.  You can then clean the rest of your shoe with soap and water to remove any remaining peanut butter/gum. Is there anything else i can help you with today? Oh wow, that peanut butter thing really works? Awesome! It sure does! That's it, you've been very helpful! Great, thank you and have a wonderful day!

I'm so sorry to hear you havent reveived your package yet. I'll be happy to look into it for you. Could you provide me with your full name please? My name is Alessandro Phoenix Thank you Alessandro, I was able to pull up your account Could you also give me your Username, Email address and Order ID so I can validate the purchase? My username is ap610366, my email is ap610366@email.com, and my order ID is 0215031231 Thank you so much, everything looks good there. Pleasen ote that it can take up to 7 days for an item to arrive after it's been shipped. How long have you been waiting for your package? Around 2 weeks Oh my, well that's definitely much longer than it should take I'll be happy to reship your order. Could you provide me with your full address please? My address is 2773 Brushwick Dr  San Mateo, WA 17735 and what was the item you purchased? I purchased a Shirt from Michael_Kora, a Jacket from Michael_Kors, and Jeans from Guess. Alright you're all set. We'll get those items out to you ASAP. Was there anything else I could help you with? No, that's everything I need. Thanks a lot. No problem. THank you for shopping with us. Have a great day!

target: search faq [none]; search for jeans [none]; select topic in faq [how to remove a grass stain]
input: Dialogue: Hello. Can I help you with anything today? Good morning, so sorry to bother you with this but I was thinking of buying a pair of jeans you had on your site? No problem at all. So you are looking for some new jeans? Yes! They're Michael Kors jeans that I think are listed for $99? Is there anything you would like to know about them? Well there's a few things. But I guess first I'd just like to know if you have a good majority of these in stock? Have you tried adding them to your cart? The site will tell you if they are out of stock. Is there anything specifically I can help you with today? Ah okay, well secondly I guess if say I actually had a pair of these already would you know of who I'm supposed to contact if I have an issue with them? You can contact us. Customer service. Is there anyhting else I can help you with? Yeah sorry, the truth is I bought these for my son and he ended up slipping on some grass outside and now there's a pretty bad grass stain on it that we can't seem to get out. I was thinking of maybe ordering another or if you had any tips on how to remove it, that we haven't tried it. Oh I see. Well let me take a look for. Can I have your name please? My name is Crystal Minh before ordering a new pair let me give you some advice Crustal. Try using a sponge with diluted white vinegar to lightly dab the stain. Then use some paper towels to dry the spot. Then place the in the washing machine inside out. Use cold water on the washing machine. Do you know how much vinegar? Just a small amount diluted in some water. Is there anything else I can help you with? I think that's everything actually, thank you Great give that a shot. It should help you not have to buy a new pair.
input_w_possible_actions: Dialogue: Hello. Can I help you with anything today? Good morning, so sorry to bother you with this but I was thinking of buying a pair of jeans you had on your site? No problem at all. So you are looking for some new jeans? Yes! They're Michael Kors jeans that I think are listed for $99? Is there anything you would like to know about them? Well there's a few things. But I guess first I'd just like to know if you have a good majority of these in stock? Have you tried adding them to your cart? The site will tell you if they are out of stock. Is there anything specifically I can help you with today? Ah okay, well secondly I guess if say I actually had a pair of these already would you know of who I'm supposed to contact if I have an issue with them? You can contact us. Customer service. Is there anyhting else I can help you with? Yeah sorry, the truth is I bought these for my son and he ended up slipping on some grass outside and now there's a pretty bad grass stain on it that we can't seem to get out. I was thinking of maybe ordering another or if you had any tips on how to remove it, that we haven't tried it. Oh I see. Well let me take a look for. Can I have your name please? My name is Crystal Minh before ordering a new pair let me give you some advice Crustal. Try using a sponge with diluted white vinegar to lightly dab the stain. Then use some paper towels to dry the spot. Then place the in the washing machine inside out. Use cold water on the washing machine. Do you know how much vinegar? Just a small amount diluted in some water. Is there anything else I can help you with? I think that's everything actually, thank you Great give that a shot. It should help you not have to buy a new pair.
